IN.IC: se uporablja v sedanjiku, je pa tudi pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To overcome a problem or a feeling
pomeni uspešno razrešiti ali obvladati težavo ali čustvo.

seg.quote: I was still trying to overcome my fear of the dark.
We tried to overcome their objections to the plan.

sense.def:
To be overcome by a feeling
pomeni zelo močno občutiti neko čustvo.

seg.quote: I was overcome by a sense of failure.
